entry.title: Saturday night: Light wet snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light wet snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light wet snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Light wet snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
